Spark – The Definitive Guide – exclusive preview

Previous post
Next post

 
  http likes 44
Tags: Apache Spark, Databricks, Free ebook, Python, Scala, SQL

Get an exclusive preview of "Spark: The Definitive Guide" from Databricks! Learn how Spark runs on a cluster, see examples in SQL, Python and Scala, Learn about Structured Streaming and Machine Learning and more.


Sponsored Post.

Get an exclusive preview of our book Spark: The Definitive Guide, courtesy of Databricks. Apache Spark has seen immense growth over the past several years but while that blistering pace of innovation moves the project forward, it makes keeping up to date with all the improvements challenging. To solve this problem, Databricks is happy to preview Spark: The Definitive Guide. The full book will be published later this year, but we wanted you to have several chapters ahead of time!

In this condensed ebook, you will:

  • Deep dive into how Spark runs on a cluster
  • Review detailed examples in SQL, Python and Scala
  • Learn about Structured Streaming and Machine Learning
  • Learn from examples of GraphFrames and Deep Learning with TensorFrames

Download the sneak peek of  
Spark: The Definitive Guide from Databricks to learn more.
